title: 2nd Meeting of the Community and Protective Services Committee
also_present: R. Wilcox and J. Bunn (Committee Clerk)

content.string: The meeting was called to order at 1:01 PM.
That it BE NOTED that no pecuniary interests were disclosed.

motion_texts.string: That Items 2.1 and 2.3 to 2.6 BE APPROVED.

1.title: 6th Report of the Accessibility Community Advisory Committee

motion_texts.string: That the 6th Report of the Accessibility Community Advisory Committee, from its meeting held on November 28, 2024, BE RECEIVED.

3.title: End of Mortgage/End of Agreement Strategic Framework and Funding Model for Social Housing

motion_texts.string: That, on the recommendation of the Deputy City Manager, Planning and Economic Development, the following actions be taken with respect to the staff report, dated January 6, 2025, related to the End of Mortgage/End of Agreement Strategic Framework and Funding Model for Social Housing:
a)    the End of Mortgage / End of Agreement Strategic Framework BE APPROVED including the funding model outlined in the above-noted report; and,
b)    the Civic Administration BE DIRECTED to progress discussions and supporting bodies of work to support the terms of the Service Agreement. (2024-S11)

attachments.title: 2025-01-06 SR End of Mortgage End of Agreement Strategic Framework and Funding Model

4.title: End of Mortgage/End of Agreement Service Agreement Template

motion_texts.string: That, on the recommendation of the Deputy City Manager, Planning and Economic Development, the following actions be taken with respect to the staff report, dated January 6, 2024, related to the End of Mortgage/End of Agreement Service Agreement Template:
a)    the Part VII.I Service Agreement template, as appended to the above-noted staff report, BE APPROVED; and,

b)    the Deputy City Manager, Planning and Economic Development, or their written designate, BE AUTHORIZED to enter into negotiations with eligible housing providers and bring forward proposed Service Agreements, including proposed funding levels, to Council for approval. (2024-S11)

attachments.title: 2025-01-06 SR End of Mortgage End of Agreement Service Agreement Template

5.title: 1958 Duluth Crescent, Block 5 - Approval of Contribution Agreement with Wastell Developments Inc.

motion_texts.string: That, on the recommendation of the Deputy City Manager, Planning and Economic Development, the following actions be taken with respect to the revised staff report, dated January 6, 2024, related to 1958 Duluth Crescent, Block 5, Approval of Contribution Agreement with Wastell Developments Inc.:
a)    the proposed by-law, as appended to the above-noted revised staff report, BE INTRODUCED at the Municipal Council meeting on January 21, 2025, to:
b)    the above-noted staff report BE RECEIVED. (2024-L04A)

attachments.title: 2025-01-06 SR 1958 Duluth Cres. Block 5 - Approval of Contribution Agmt - Full

6.title: Employment Services Case Management Implementation Update

motion_texts.string: That on the recommendation of the Deputy City Manager, Social and Health Development, the following actions be taken with respect to the staff report, dated January 6, 2024, related to an Employment Services Case Management Implementation Update:
a)    a single source procurement, in accordance with section 14.4 (3) of the Procurement Policy, BE APPROVED;
b)    the Civic Administration BE AUTHORIZED to undertake all administrative acts that are necessary in connection with this project; and,
c)    the above-noted staff report BE RECEIVED. (2024-C09)

attachments.title: 2025-01-06 SR Employment Services Case Management Implementation Update

2.title: 12th Report of the Environmental Stewardship and Action Community Advisory Committee

motion_texts.string: That the 12th Report of the Environmental Stewardship and Action Community Advisory Committee, from the meeting held on December 4, 2024, BE RECEIVED; it being noted that a verbal delegation from B. Samuels, Chair, Environmental Stewardship and Action Community Advisory Committee, with respect to this matter, was received.

1.title: Dog Licensing and Control By-law PH-4

motion_texts.string: That the communication dated January 6, 2025 from Councillor H. McAlister with respect to the Dog Licensing and Control By-law BE REFERRED to the Civic Administration for review;
it being noted that a communication, as appended to the agenda, and a verbal delegation from S. Karchut, with respect to this matter, were received. (2024-C09)
Motion to approve the request for delegation status from S. Karchut to be heard at this meeting.

attachments.title: 2025-01-06 Sub. Dog Licensing and Control By-law - H. McAlister

motion_texts.string: That the meeting BE ADJOURNED.
